felixGao.name: Felix Gao
felixGao.description: Felix is the chief editor of the Newspaper Team. Basically, you can blame all typos on him :/.

mahadAga.name: Mahad Aga
mahadAga.description: Mahad is a volunteer writer at the Newspaper Team. He also builds infra for the team. He enjoys using aga emojis and thinks everyone should use them.

AliceJohnson.name: Alice Johnson
AliceJohnson.description: Alice Johnson works at Hack Club HQ as a Gap Year. She makes YSWS based on hardware and also runs [Rocket Hardware Parade](rocket.example.com), this year's summer flagship.

MariaChen.name: Maria Chen
MariaChen.description: Maria Chen coordinates the editing team and ensures every article meets the highest standards. She loves creative writing and robotics.

SamirPatel.name: Samir Patel
SamirPatel.description: Samir Patel covers Hack Club events and workshops. He is interested in photography and web development.
